name: No Good Choice (NESDev Competition)
description:
This is NESDev 2020 Competition entry as submitted.

Premise

You're stuck in a room in an infested bunker during a zombie apocalypse. Out of food and water, you have no option but to try to escape. With no weapons or training, it's hard to tell if leaving is a good choice.

Controls

✜ Move/Use/Melee
Ⓑ Confirm/Select
Start: Inventory

Credits

Title screen by Zoltan Haller
Music by Vladimir Veremenko
